sentences.sContent: She admitted that the interview had been a complete farce from start to finish.
sentences.sCn: 她承认，采访从头到尾完全是一场闹剧。

remMethod.val: 别小看了滑稽剧(farce)， 有时它也很有批判的力量(force)

words.tran: 滑稽的；闹剧的；引人发笑的

trans.tranCn: 笑剧， 滑稽剧； 闹剧
trans.tranOther: a humorous play or film in which the characters are involved in complicated and silly situations, or the style of writing or acting that is used
